name: Callisto
overview: Callisto (not to be confused with Caverns of Callisto) is a side-scrolling space shooter released for the ABBUC competition of 2012. Like most games of the genre, joystick maneuvers the space ship, fire shoots the ship gun, and dodging both enemy ships and landscape is required. Sometimes moving the ship forward or backwards is necessary to time a path around projected force fields or shots.
